text: tatha (yaad karo) jab allaah ne nabiyon se vachan liya ki jababhee main tumhen koee pustak aur prabodh (tatvadarshita) doon, phir tumhaare paas koee rasool use pramaanit karate hue aaye, jo tumhaare paas hai, to tum avashy usapar eemaan laana aur usaka samarthan karana. (allaah) ne kahaah kya tumane sveekaar kiya aur isapar mere vachan ka bhaar uthaaya? to sabane kahaah hamane sveekaar kar liya. allaah ne kahaah tum saakshee raho aur main bhee tumhaare[1] saath saakshiyon mein se hoon
